text: Need Victoria Carter for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $19,969, looking for 1 x Brand photoshoot, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Product photography, 3 x Instagram post, 1 x Facebook post. 5 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
